task.summary:
Implement MVP for Document Vault with time-based messaging
- Create DocumentVault class with core functionality - Implement Flask web server for API endpoints - Add countdown timer and message sending logic - Create Updates.txt with implementation details and next steps"

New Features and Changes
Implemented email link functionality for resetting the countdown timer Created a setup script for initializing the project structure Added instructions for setting up the GitHub project
Implementation Details
Modified the DocumentVault class to include a reset token Added a new Flask route /reset/<token> to handle timer resets via email link Updated the send_message method to include the reset link in the email Created a shell script setup_project.sh to set up the project structure

New Features and Changes
Implemented email link functionality for resetting the countdown timer Created a setup script for initializing the project structure Added instructions for setting up the GitHub project
Implementation Details
Modified the DocumentVault class to include a reset token Added a new Flask route /reset/<token> to handle timer resets via email link Updated the send_message method to include the reset link in the email Created a shell script setup_project.sh to set up the project structure
git commit -m "Add root route and simple homepage"

Implement Google OAuth authentication and update main routes
- Add OAuth client initialization in app/__init__.py - Create login and callback routes in app/routes/auth.py - Enable insecure transport for development (to be removed in production) - Update main routes to handle authenticated and unauthenticated users - Create new templates: landing.html and dashboard.html - Update base.html with proper navigation - Fix InsecureTransportError for development - Improve error handling in OAuth callback - Update Updates.txt with recent changes

Major update: Implement OAuth, document and recipient management, and testing infrastructure
- Add Google OAuth authentication - Implement CRUD operations for documents and recipients - Set up APScheduler for background tasks - Update testing configuration with mock OAuth client - Fix various bugs and import issues - Update templates and routing for authenticated/unauthenticated users

Fix test suite issues and improve test configuration
- Updated MockOAuthClient for more realistic OAuth URL - Modified AuthActions to prevent duplicate user creation - Added db_session fixture for proper database handling in tests - Ensured TestConfig is used in app fixture - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps

Fix test suite issues and improve test configuration
- Updated MockOAuthClient for more realistic OAuth URL - Modified AuthActions to prevent duplicate user creation - Added db_session fixture for proper database handling in tests - Ensured TestConfig is used in app fixture - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps

ix Document model and update test configuration
- Added 'recipient' relationship to Document model - Updated test configuration to properly handle app fixture - Modified AuthActions to use app_context correctly - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps

Fix unit tests, add test email functionality, and improve UI/UX
- Updated MockOAuthClient and fixed create_user test - Added route for sending test emails - Improved overall look and feel with updated HTML and custom CSS - Implemented dark mode and accessibility improvements - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps

Address LegacyAPIWarning and update to SQLAlchemy 2.0 compatible syntax
- Updated models to use SQLAlchemy 2.0 style relationships - Modified application initialization for proper SQLAlchemy setup - Updated auth routes to use db.session.get() instead of User.query.get() - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps

Implement various improvements and new features
- Fixed file availability issue after logout/login - Added recent activity stream to dashboard - Improved configuration screen with test email feature - Added CLI commands for testing scheduler and document countdown - Updated Updates.txt with latest changes and next steps
